name: Smallest Theft Auto
description:
A very concise clone of ! Kill people to get money (you have to walk over those green dollars on the ground once they die...).

Don't get busted! Your home and your lover's house are the only safe places.

The game can be controlled by keyboard or by touch screen.

Keyboad commands:

Arrows: move & drive

Space: action button (fire, buy...)

Enter: take vehicles, enter buildings

Shift: exit vehicles, building.
